sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD AS COMM_CD , UT_DPOB_NM AS COMM_CD_NM FROM BASS0120 WHERE HHRK_UNT_DPOB_CD IS NULL ORDER BY UT_DPOB_NM ASC
SELECT SYS_DPOB_CD AS COMM_CD , SYS_DPOB_NM AS COMM_CD_NM FROM SYSM0050 ORDER BY SYS_DPOB_NM ASC
SELECT USE_SYS_DIV_CD AS COMM_CD , USE_SYS_DIV_CD AS COMM_CD_NM FROM SYSM0050 ORDER BY USE_SYS_DIV_CD ASC
SELECT DPOB_CD AS COMM_CD , UT_DPOB_NM AS COMM_CD_NM , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD FROM BASS0120 WHERE HHRK_UNT_DPOB_CD IS NULL ORDER BY UT_DPOB_NM ASC
SELECT SYS_DIV_CD , SYS_DIV_CD AS SYS_DIV_NM FROM BASS0120 WHERE SYS_DIV_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY SYS_DIV_CD
sqlMap.update:
MERGE INTO BASS0120 USING DUAL ON (DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET UT_DPOB_NM=#utDpobNm# , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM= #degtrResnRegnNum# , DEGTR_NM=#degtrNm# , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM= replace(#busoprRgstnNum#,'-','') , CORP_RGSTN_NUM= replace(#corpRgstnNum#,'-','') , CORP_DIV_CD=#corpDivCd# , UNT_DPOB_ZPCD= replace(#untDpobZpcd#,'-','') , UNT_DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR=#untDpobFndtnAddr# , UNT_DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR=#untDpobDtlPatrAddr# , UNT_DPOB_PHN_NUM=#untDpobPhnNum# , UNT_DPOB_FAX_NUM=#untDpobFaxNum# , UNT_DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM=#untDpobSealWrdNm# , UNT_DPOB_SEAL_RFTA=#untDpobSealRfta# , UNT_DPOB_SEAL_FLNM=#untDpobSealFlnm# , UNT_DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN=#untDpobFndtnUseYn#
, ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#mtstBusinDivCd# , UNT_DPOB_ECTN_MAIL_ADDR=#untDpobEctnMailAddr# , UNT_DPOB_BNCDS_NM=#untDpobBncdsNm# , UNT_DPOB_ITEM_NM=#untDpobItemNm# , UNT_DPOB_MN_PRDT=#untDpobMnPrdt# ,UP_DPOB_CMP_NO=#upDpobCmpNo# ,UP_DPOB_UTYN_C171=#upDpobUtynC171# ,MTST_DPOB_SEIL_NUM_C172=#mtstDpobSeilNumC172# ,MNBH_DIV_CD=#mnbhDivCd# ,WHDG_TX_CTYP_DIV_CD=#whdgTxCtypDivCd#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( DPOB_CD ,UT_DPOB_CD ,UT_DPOB_NM ,HHRK_UNT_DPOB_CD ,DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM ,DEGTR_NM ,FRGNR_DIV_CD ,BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM ,CORP_RGSTN_NUM ,CORP_DIV_CD ,UNT_DPOB_ZPCD ,UNT_DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR ,UNT_DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR ,UNT_DPOB_PHN_NUM ,UNT_DPOB_FAX_NUM ,UNT_DPOB_ECTN_MAIL_ADDR ,UNT_DPOB_BNCDS_NM ,UNT_DPOB_ITEM_NM ,UNT_DPOB_MN_PRDT ,UNT_DPOB_ESBM_DT ,UNT_DPOB_INGN_DT ,UNT_DPOB_EOB_DT ,UNT_DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM ,UNT_DPOB_SEAL_RFTA ,UNT_DPOB_SEAL_FLNM ,UNT_DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN ,KYBDR ,INPT_DT ,INPT_ADDR ,ISMT ,REVN_DT ,REVN_ADDR ,MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD ,UP_DPOB_CMP_NO ,UP_DPOB_UTYN_C171 ,MTST_DPOB_SEIL_NUM_C172 ,MNBH_DIV_CD ,WHDG_TX_CTYP_DIV_CD) VALUES ( #dpobCd# ,#utDpobCd# ,#utDpobNm# ,#hhrkUntDpobCd# ,replace(#degtrResnRegnNum#,'-','') ,#degtrNm# ,#frgnrDivCd# ,#busoprRgstnNum# ,#corpRgstnNum# ,#corpDivCd# ,#untDpobZpcd# ,#untDpobFndtnAddr# ,#untDpobDtlPatrAddr# ,#untDpobPhnNum# ,#untDpobFaxNum# ,#untDpobEctnMailAddr# ,#untDpobBncdsNm# ,#untDpobItemNm# ,#untDpobMnPrdt# ,#untDpobEsbmDt# ,#untDpobIngnDt# ,#untDpobEobDt# ,#untDpobSealWrdNm# ,#untDpobSealRfta# ,#untDpobSealFlnm# ,#untDpobFndtnUseYn# ,#kybdr# ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') ,#inptAddr# ,#ismt# ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') ,#revnAddr# ,#mtstBusinDivCd# ,#upDpobCmpNo# ,#upDpobUtynC171# ,#mtstDpobSeilNumC172# ,#mnbhDivCd# ,#whdgTxCtypDivCd#)

UPDATE BASS0120 SET UT_DPOB_CD = #utDpobCd# ,UT_DPOB_NM = #utDpobNm# ,HHRK_UNT_DPOB_CD = #hhrkUntDpobCd# ,DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM = #degtrResnRegnNum# ,DEGTR_NM = #degtrNm# ,FRGNR_DIV_CD = #frgnrDivCd# ,BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM = #busoprRgstnNum# ,CORP_RGSTN_NUM = #corpRgstnNum# ,CORP_DIV_CD = #corpDivCd# ,UNT_DPOB_ZPCD = #untDpobZpcd# ,UNT_DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR = #untDpobFndtnAddr# ,UNT_DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR = #untDpobDtlPatrAddr# ,UNT_DPOB_PHN_NUM = #untDpobPhnNum# ,UNT_DPOB_FAX_NUM = #untDpobFaxNum# ,UNT_DPOB_ECTN_MAIL_ADDR= #untDpobEctnMailAddr# ,UNT_DPOB_BNCDS_NM = #untDpobBncdsNm# ,UNT_DPOB_ITEM_NM = #untDpobItemNm# ,UNT_DPOB_MN_PRDT = #untDpobMnPrdt# ,UNT_DPOB_ESBM_DT = #untDpobEsbmDt# ,UNT_DPOB_INGN_DT = #untDpobIngnDt# ,UNT_DPOB_EOB_DT = #untDpobEobDt# ,UNT_DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM = #untDpobSealWrdNm# ,UNT_DPOB_SEAL_RFTA = #untDpobSealRfta# ,UNT_DPOB_SEAL_FLNM = #untDpobSealFlnm# ,UNT_DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN = #untDpobFndtnUseYn# ,KYBDR = #kybdr# ,INPT_DT = #inptDt# ,INPT_ADDR = #inptAddr# ,ISMT = #ismt# ,REVN_DT = #revnDt# ,REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr# ,MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD = #mtstBusinDivCd# ,UP_DPOB_CMP_NO=#upDpobCmpNo# ,UP_DPOB_UTYN_C171=#upDpobUtynC171# ,MTST_DPOB_SEIL_NUM_C172=#mtstDpobSeilNumC172# ,MNBH_DIV_CD=#mnbhDivCd# ,WHDG_TX_CTYP_DIV_CD=#whdgTxCtypDivCd# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,UT_DPOB_CD /* 단위사업장코드 */ ,UT_DPOB_NM /* 단위사업장명 */ ,HHRK_UNT_DPOB_CD /* 상위단위사업장코드 */ ,DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM /* 대표자주민번호 */ ,DEGTR_NM /* 대표자명 */ ,FRGNR_DIV_CD /* 내외국인구분코드 */ ,BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM /* 사업자등록번호 */ ,CORP_RGSTN_NUM /* 법인등록번호 */ ,CORP_DIV_CD /* 법인구분코드 */ ,UNT_DPOB_ZPCD /* 단위사업장우편번호 */ ,UNT_DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR /* 단위사업장기본주소 */ ,UNT_DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR /* 단위사업장상세주소 */ ,UNT_DPOB_PHN_NUM /* 단위사업장전화번호 */ ,UNT_DPOB_FAX_NUM /* 단위사업장팩스번호 */ ,UNT_DPOB_ECTN_MAIL_ADDR /* 단위사업장전자우편주소 */ ,UNT_DPOB_BNCDS_NM /* 단위사업장업종_업태 */ ,UNT_DPOB_ITEM_NM /* 단위사업장업종_종목명 */ ,UNT_DPOB_MN_PRDT /* 단위사업장업종_주생산품 */ ,UNT_DPOB_ESBM_DT /* 단위사업장설립일자 */ ,UNT_DPOB_INGN_DT /* 단위사업장개업일자 */ ,UNT_DPOB_EOB_DT /* 단위사업장폐업일자 */ ,UNT_DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM /* 단위사업장직인문구명 */ ,UNT_DPOB_SEAL_RFTA /* 단위사업장직인경로 */ ,UNT_DPOB_SEAL_FLNM /* 단위사업장직인파일명 */ ,UNT_DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN /* 단위사업장기본사용여부 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ,MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD /* 주종사업장구분코드 */ ,UP_DPOB_CMP_NO /* 단위사업장승인번호 */ ,UP_DPOB_UTYN_C171 /* C171_사업자단위과세자여부 */ ,MTST_DPOB_SEIL_NUM_C172 /* C172_종사업장일련번호 */ ,MNBH_DIV_CD /* 본지점구분코드 */ ,WHDG_TX_CTYP_DIV_CD /* 원천세징수유형구분코드 */ FROM BASS0120 WHERE 1=1
AND UT_DPOB_NM like '%'|| #utDpobNm# || '%'
AND DEGTR_NM like '%'|| #degtrNm# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT /* bass0120DAO.selectBass0120ListTotCnt_S */ COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0120 WHERE 1=1
AND UT_DPOB_NM like '%'|| #utDpobNm# || '%'
AND DEGTR_NM like '%'|| #degtrNm# || '%'
